section.title: Trentino Inter process communication binding using shared memory
Overview
section.para: This chapter introduces how to configure Trentino to communicate using Interprocess communication.

Trentino implements Remote Procedural Calls (RPC) using direct interprocess communication between Trentino runtimes. The transport is implemented by internally using shared memory, but it is completely transparent for the end user.

section.title: Simple synchronous RPC using Trentino IPC Binding
section.para: This chapter introduces how to configure Trentino to communicate using Interprocess communication.

Trentino implements Remote Procedural Calls (RPC) using direct interprocess communication based on memory sharing between Trentino runtimes. The memory sharing is completely transparent for the end user.
